home.aboutText1: I am an ocean sciences researcher focusing on the impacts of climate change on marine ecosystems. My research integrates satellite remote sensing data, statistical modeling, and Earth system model analysis to quantify and understand the impacts of anthropogenic climate change on global ocean chlorophyll.
home.aboutText2: Currently, I am a @constants.en.positions.postdoc in the @constants.en.institutions.tsinghua_department, developing data-driven frameworks to quantify the impacts of typhoons and extreme climate events on phytoplankton dynamics. I received my Ph.D. in Ocean Sciences from the @constants.en.institutions.ucsc_full (UCSC) in 2025, with research focusing on the detection and attribution of changes in ocean chlorophyll.
home.aboutText3: My research interests include: detection and attribution of ocean chlorophyll, impacts of climate change on marine ecosystems, satellite remote sensing data analysis, @constants.en.technologies.bayesian_modeling, and Earth system model analysis.
home.area1Title: Detection and Attribution of Ocean Chlorophyll
home.area1Desc: Using satellite observations and climate model simulations to detect and attribute changes in ocean chlorophyll, understanding the signals of anthropogenic climate change on marine ecosystems.
home.area2Desc: Studying the long-term impacts of climate change on marine ecosystems, including the mechanisms of extreme events on phytoplankton dynamics.
home.area3Desc: Integrating multi-source satellite and reanalysis data, developing data-driven frameworks to quantify changes in marine ecosystems.
home.area4Desc: Applying @constants.en.technologies.bayesian_frameworks, spatiotemporal series analysis, and other statistical methods to establish dynamic models for detecting and predicting trends in marine ecosystems.

research.title: Research | Dongran Zhai
research.description: Research areas and projects of Dongran Zhai - Ocean chlorophyll, climate change, satellite remote sensing
research.pageSubtitle: My research focuses on understanding the impacts of climate change on marine ecosystems, particularly through satellite remote sensing and statistical modeling methods
research.overviewText1: My research is dedicated to detecting and attributing the impacts of anthropogenic climate change on global ocean chlorophyll. By integrating satellite remote sensing observations, climate model simulations, and advanced statistical methods, I develop new frameworks to understand long-term changes in marine ecosystems and their responses to climate change.
research.overviewText2: Currently, I am a @constants.en.positions.postdoc in the @constants.en.institutions.tsinghua_department, focusing on developing data-driven frameworks to quantify the impacts of typhoons and extreme climate events on phytoplankton dynamics. My research reveals nonlinear response mechanisms of chlorophyll a seasonal cycles to storm-induced perturbations, providing a predictive basis for ecological responses under climate variability.
research.area1TitleEn: Detection and Attribution of Ocean Chlorophyll
research.area1DescEn: Using satellite observations and @constants.en.technologies.cmip6 climate model simulations to detect and attribute changes in ocean chlorophyll. Developed new methods integrating satellite remote sensing and climate model simulations, applying @constants.en.technologies.bayesian_frameworks and spatiotemporal series analysis to identify signals of anthropogenic climate change on marine ecosystems.
research.area2TitleEn: Climate Change Impacts on Marine Ecosystems
research.area2DescEn: Studying the long-term impacts of climate change on marine ecosystems, including the effects of extreme climate events (such as typhoons) on phytoplankton dynamics. Revealing nonlinear response mechanisms of chlorophyll seasonal cycles to storm-induced perturbations.
research.area3TitleEn: Satellite Remote Sensing and Data Integration
research.area3DescEn: Integrating multi-source satellite and reanalysis data, developing data-driven frameworks to quantify changes in marine ecosystems. Applying GIS technologies, satellite ocean color data, and multi-sensor data integration methods.
research.area4TitleEn: Statistical Modeling and Time Series Analysis
research.area4DescEn: Applying Bayesian frameworks, dynamic spatiotemporal models, and time series methods to detect and predict trends in marine ecosystems. Developed a Bayesian dynamic space-time model informed by optical variability for detecting trends in ocean satellite chlorophyll.

home.title: Dongran Zhai | 个人主页
home.description: Dongran Zhai博士的个人学术网站 - 海洋科学研究、气候变化、卫星遥感数据分析
home.metaDescription: Dongran Zhai博士的个人学术网站 - 海洋科学研究、气候变化、卫星遥感数据分析
home.subtitle: @constants.zh.positions.postdoc
home.aboutText1: 我是一名海洋科学研究人员，专注于气候变化对海洋生态系统的影响。我的研究结合了卫星遥感数据、统计建模和地球系统模型分析，以量化和理解人为气候变化对全球海洋叶绿素的影响。
home.aboutText2: 目前，我在@constants.zh.institutions.tsinghua_department担任@constants.zh.positions.postdoc，开发数据驱动框架来量化台风和极端气候对浮游植物动态的影响。我于2025年获得@constants.zh.institutions.ucsc_full（UCSC）海洋科学博士学位，研究重点是海洋叶绿素变化的检测与归因。
home.aboutText3: 我的研究兴趣包括：海洋叶绿素检测与归因、气候变化对海洋生态系统的影响、卫星遥感数据分析、@constants.zh.technologies.bayesian_modeling、以及地球系统模型分析。
home.area1Title: 海洋叶绿素检测与归因
home.area1Desc: 使用卫星观测和气候模型模拟来检测和归因海洋叶绿素的变化，理解人为气候变化对海洋生态系统的信号。
home.area2Desc: 研究气候变化对海洋生态系统的长期影响，包括极端事件对浮游植物动态的影响机制。
home.area3Desc: 整合多源卫星和再分析数据，开发数据驱动框架来量化海洋生态系统的变化。
home.area4Desc: 应用@constants.zh.technologies.bayesian_frameworks、@constants.zh.technologies.spatiotemporal_analysis等统计方法，建立动态模型来检测和预测海洋生态系统的趋势。

research.title: 研究 | Dongran Zhai
research.description: Dongran Zhai的研究领域和项目 - 海洋叶绿素、气候变化、卫星遥感
research.pageSubtitle: 我的研究专注于理解气候变化对海洋生态系统的影响，特别是通过卫星遥感和统计建模方法
research.overviewText1: 我的研究致力于检测和归因人为气候变化对全球海洋叶绿素的影响。通过整合卫星遥感观测、气候模型模拟和先进的统计方法，我开发了新的框架来理解海洋生态系统的长期变化及其对气候变化的响应。
research.overviewText2: 目前，我在@constants.zh.institutions.tsinghua_department担任@constants.zh.positions.postdoc，专注于开发数据驱动框架来量化台风和极端气候事件对浮游植物动态的影响。我的研究揭示了叶绿素a季节循环对风暴诱导扰动的非线性响应机制，为气候变化变异性下的生态响应提供了预测基础。
research.area1TitleEn: 海洋叶绿素检测与归因
research.area1DescEn: 使用卫星观测和@constants.zh.technologies.cmip6气候模型模拟来检测和归因海洋叶绿素的变化。开发了整合卫星遥感和气候模型模拟的新方法，应用@constants.zh.technologies.bayesian_frameworks和@constants.zh.technologies.spatiotemporal_analysis来识别人为气候变化对海洋生态系统的信号。
research.area2TitleEn: 气候变化对海洋生态系统的影响
research.area2DescEn: 研究气候变化对海洋生态系统的长期影响，包括极端气候事件（如台风）对浮游植物动态的影响。揭示叶绿素季节循环对风暴诱导扰动的非线性响应机制。
research.area3DescEn: 整合多源卫星和再分析数据，开发数据驱动框架来量化海洋生态系统的变化。应用@constants.zh.technologies.gis、@constants.zh.technologies.satellite_ocean_color和@constants.zh.technologies.multi_sensor。
research.area4TitleEn: 统计建模与时间序列分析
research.area4DescEn: 应用@constants.zh.technologies.bayesian_frameworks、动态时空模型和@constants.zh.technologies.time_series来检测和预测海洋生态系统的趋势。开发了基于光学变异性信息的@constants.zh.technologies.bayesian动态时空模型来检测海洋卫星叶绿素的趋势。
